title: building pytorch without CUDA
body_html:
Hi
I've been trying to build PyTorch without CUDA so that it uses CPU only. I'm trying to run FlowNet for PyTorch. I exported the NO_CUDA=1 variable but when I run the code it outputs a note that says I need to purchase an NVIDIA GPU. And the calls to CUDA due to which I get the said output are from torch files, not from the FlowNet code files.
Can anybody help me out?
Thanks
